Title: Prohibits certain municipal employees from serving as political party officers
Summary: Prohibits municipal employees appointed by the chief executive officer of a municipality or the governing body of a municipality, who are not members of a collective bargaining unit, from serving as political party officers in any capacity; exempts municipal employees appointed by a school district or fire district.
LawCode: Amd ยง806, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting certain municipal employees from serving as political party officers
